scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These three documents (electrostatic copies), 1861 and 1866, relate to the estate of Michael Henkle of Pendleton County, Virginia. Included are a "Conditions of Sale," November 18, 1861; a "Conditions of Sale of Negroes," November 19, 1861; and, a receipt, 1866, from the Clerk of Pendleton County.
